channel.title: WinstonBrown.me
channel.description: Welcome to winstonbrown.me. I'm Winston Brown, a self-taught software engineer, sharing my journey through coding, personal projects, and new technologies. Here, you'll find my insights, lessons learned, and the occasional career adviceâ€”all from my perspective as I navigate the tech world.

item.title: Understanding MVC with Angular, MongoDB, and NestJS: A Practical Guide
item.description: Learn how the MVC pattern works with Angular as the front end, NestJS as the backend API, and MongoDB as the database, using the /average endpoint from a MathAPI example.
item.author: clouddevsolutions@gmail.com (Winston Brown)

item.title: Exploring FastAPI with My MathAPI Demo
item.description: Discover how easy it is to build an API with FastAPI through my MathAPI demo, which calculates the average of a list of numbers. Learn about the features that make FastAPI a fantastic tool for developers.
item.author: clouddevsolutions@gmail.com (Winston Brown)

item.title: InnoTech Oklahoma Conference 2024: Must-Attend Featured Events and ThunderPlains Highlights
item.description: Explore the exciting events at InnoTech Oklahoma 2024, including key highlights like the ThunderPlains Dev Conference. Discover featured sessions, speakers, and must-attend opportunities.
item.author: clouddevsolutions@gmail.com (Winston Brown)

item.title: VLC Player Keyboard Shortcuts for Mac: Cheatsheet
item.description: Master VLC Player on macOS with this guide to essential keyboard shortcuts. Download the PDF for a complete reference.
item.author: clouddevsolutions@gmail.com (Winston Brown)

item.title: Introducing Canvas for ChatGPT: 5 Reasons Developers Should Be Excited
item.description: Discover why OpenAI's new Canvas feature for ChatGPT is a game changer for developers. Learn about its collaborative capabilities, visual workspace, and more.
item.author: clouddevsolutions@gmail.com (Winston Brown)

item.title: Top Resources for Finding Software Engineering Roles
item.description: A comprehensive guide to the best online resources for software engineers seeking new job opportunities. This article covers popular job boards, state-sponsored resources, and tips for staying ahead in a competitive job market.
item.author: clouddevsolutions@gmail.com (Winston Brown)

item.title: State-Sponsored Job Boards
item.description: A guide to state-sponsored job boards across the U.S. and its territories, helping to find local job opportunities that may not be listed on larger platforms.
item.author: clouddevsolutions@gmail.com (Winston Brown)

item.title: Creating Functions in PostgreSQL
item.description: Learn how to create a simple function in PostgreSQL to average numbers from a table.
item.author: clouddevsolutions@gmail.com (Winston Brown)

item.title: Mastering Python List Comprehension for Performance and Elegance
item.description: Learn the ins and outs of Python list comprehension and how it enhances code performance with examples for various use cases.
item.author: clouddevsolutions@gmail.com (Winston Brown)

item.title: The Future of Hybrid AI/Human Models
item.description: Exploring how AI will not replace humans but rather enhance human creativity and productivity through collaborative models.
item.author: clouddevsolutions@gmail.com (Winston Brown)

item.title: Understanding Service Lifetimes in ASP.NET Core
item.description: A deep dive into the different service lifetimes in ASP.NET Core and when to use Transient, Scoped, and Singleton services.
item.author: clouddevsolutions@gmail.com (Winston Brown)

item.title: Understanding Dependency Injection
item.description: A primer on Dependency Injection and its importance in modern software development.
item.author: clouddevsolutions@gmail.com (Winston Brown)
